trans-unit.target: Usado para executar a avaliação de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> used to create a new instance of <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.#ctor(System.Type,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider)" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> usado para criar uma nova instância de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.#ctor(System.Type,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider)" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" /> class with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> to evaluate and a rule type to create a new instance of <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.#ctor(System.Type,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider)" /> to use for rule expression validation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" /> com um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> a ser avaliado e um tipo de regra para criar uma nova instância de <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.#ctor(System.Type,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider)" /> a ser usada para validação da expressão de regra.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> used to validate rule expressions.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> usado para validar as expressões de regra.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" /> class with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> to evaluate using <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEngine" /> com um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> a ser avaliado usando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: Executes the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> against the object instance (which, in this case, is likely an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />).
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> atual contra a instância do objeto (que, nesse caso, é provavelmente um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />).
